import React,{createContext,useContext,useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UseContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const UseProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[selectedQuery,setSelectedQuery]=useState("");const[selectedReportTitle,setSelectedReportTitle]=useState("");const[selectedRecNo,setSelectedRecNo]=useState("");const[selectedInitRun,setSelectedInitRun]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const localStorageKey="report_".concat(selectedRecNo);const storedSelectedQuery=localStorage.getItem("".concat(localStorageKey,"_selectedQuery"));const storedSelectedReportTitle=localStorage.getItem("".concat(localStorageKey,"_selectedReportTitle"));const storedSelectedInitRun=localStorage.getItem("".concat(localStorageKey,"_selectedInitRun"));if(storedSelectedQuery&&storedSelectedReportTitle&&storedSelectedInitRun){setSelectedQuery(storedSelectedQuery);setSelectedReportTitle(storedSelectedReportTitle);setSelectedInitRun(storedSelectedInitRun);}},[selectedRecNo]);// Burada selectedRecNo'yu bağımlılık dizisine ekliyoruz
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UseContext.Provider,{value:{selectedQuery,setSelectedQuery,selectedReportTitle,setSelectedReportTitle,selectedRecNo,setSelectedRecNo,selectedInitRun,setSelectedInitRun},children:children});};export const useQuery=()=>useContext(UseContext);
